Direct Known Subclasses:
LogicalCanvas
public class GraphCanvas
extends Raphael
implements Fillable

A widget to draw directed graphs. Uses the RaphaÃ«l-Library (http://raphaeljs.com/) and its GWT-wrapper raphaelgwt (http://code.google.com/p/raphaelgwt/)

Author:
Patrick Brosi

public void hangShapeOntoNode(java.lang.String identifier,
                              ConnectedShape s,
                              int nid)
